I Am a 21 Year Old Danish Student. Ask Me Anything.


This is my first AMA post
I’m constantly broke, not happy with my decisions, having trouble finding happiness. AMA
I'm a celebrity. Can you guess who I am? AMA.

I'm a Makeup artist and worked at several porn shoots. Ama


Hi, I'm Nicola or Nikki.

I was always into all this beauty stuff so I started to work for a Beauty Studio after school.

A girl I know, because we went to school together, did some modeling and I always did her make-up and hair. She is pretty but didn't have any success as model yet. Because she needs money, she agreed on doing porn shoots.

Her first shoot was 3 weeks ago and I was there for her make-up and hair. I was paid for this for the first time. By now she did 4 shoots and I was always present.

A lot of people around me do think that that's an interesting topic, so here I am for an AMA :)

Nikki
Let’s be friends! Ask me anything!

I'm the Messiah, the Savior of the world. AMA


All the religions in the world are lies! which is half lie and half truth.
The doomsday is coming.
I have the only truth of the world which no one wants to know about it.

[* First of all, the whole meaning of this article is to clarify my innocence to the whole world.
 * And my English is terrible as hell which made me sound like an idiot. I really wish I could write in my native language Chinese, and some warm-hearted person could translate my article. Could anybody help?
 * And I just dash off all of this in a hurry because I'm not given much time to think and edit. 
 * The god is controlling my brain, feelings, memories, behaviors and extra-sensory perception. I'm gradually losing my individual will. The god told me if I don't tell it now, I'll regret forever 'cause I'll become a real robot human being soon.
 * I only answer questions which is urgent for my priority. ]



First, I'm sorry to unveil the truth too early to the you all which will hurt your sense of security and may attract danger to my life. But I have no choice now. If I don't say it now, I'll lose the chance forever.




Here's a prediction of the future world:
1. In the first place, you'll behold a real huge superstar singer in human history. She’s songs are miracle human-being have never heard.  She's a female Chinese in America.
    But she‘s also a real shame of human being. She’s a public adulteress. ppl cannot tolerate her gross that all the nice guy just want her to die immediately. But all the ppl cannot afford it to live without her songs.
    Above all, she's a mega singer who brings human heaven and hell at the same time.
2. Next up, human microchips will be universal which will be started some time. Then ppl with chips will become beasts attacking their families and other ppl. As you know the chips have already be implanted in lots of country which has a nickname 666 which means beast.
   The whole world will become a disaster which maybe like a zombie world or something. The above-mentioned soul singer will become spiritual leader of the whole world, and lead troops to kill the brutal chip-brains.
3. At last, your leader will be controlled to become a demon who eats human and cannot be killed or in the resurrecting way. No one can stop her from eating your families.
4. One day, she'll finally eat her true lover, and be control to totally wake up. She'll be haunted by pains. Then she'll get out of her misery by realizing Sunyata 'cause that's the only way to kill herself and her misery. Then she'll write a book which is your Strategy Guide to flee from your misery sea. Then you all will learn about the book. The day you wake up,you could use her book to kill yourself and become a real Buddha.



      After talking about the prediction. Let's know more about the Messiah. She's the most miserable human being in the world, all because she doesn't have quintillions of reincarnations like you all. She's forced to simulate your countless lifes for a single lifetime.
      She has to accumulate enough sufferings to overtake your million million reincarnations‘ pains. 
      She'll be controlled by the god like a software. The god talk to her in her brain, control her body and behavior, change her memories. When she feel horror, god will convert her fear to lust which she hates the most. The god gives her all the rough feeling. All is for torturing her.
      By the way, the god told her that she'll be raped and killed many times. That's why she could sing from the deepest soul, the thirst for freedom and love and home from the hell.


      [There's so much to say. Just type these words and submit first. Then I'll come back to re-edit this article. Hope some ppl could help me to translate so I can write in Chinese to express myself freely. ]

I fucked a table. AMA.


There I was, at the church waiting in a side room to be picked up by my parents. Yes, a fucking church. And oh, did I have the erection of my life.

I changed positions in my seat, trying to relieve the intense pressure in my overly tight jeans. I look down, and to my horror I see the bulging outline of a poorly smuggled eight inch salami. I panic. It may as well be a strobe light, with blaring sirens and its own Yelp listing. There was no way I was getting home without everyone’s mother and the President noticing the unapologetic flagpole at full mast between my legs that was proudly bearing the universal flag for Horny Perverts everywhere. 

Then it happened. My quivering member brushed against the cold metal leg of the table. I gasp uncontrollably. My eyes roll back. My back arches. My now pulsing appendage has had a taste, and with the hunger of a pack of hunting lions it wills me forward. My hips move seemingly of their own volition, and I begin to caress the table leg with a rod of my own that was equally as hard and burning with a raging passion that could only be extinguished by the metallic coolness of the table leg.

The pressure inside my cock builds and I lose any desire to hold back. My hips become a primal motor, a pumping engine, an unstoppable machine. My battering ram intensifies it’s assault, but it’s not enough. I grab the helpless table with both hands and with force move it in motion with my hips. My books and homework tumble forgotten to the floor. The silent table doesn’t voice any resistance as it submits to my carnal desire, and with bestial intensity I dominate it and take it as my own. 

The pressure peaks and the awakened volcano erupts with a magnitude of force and fluid that would have caused every victim of Pompeii to blush. With the climax I gasp breathlessly, my voice catching in my throat as I feel my prostate contracting. Semen fills my pants, the musky smell fills the room and a dripping wetness creeps down my pant leg. 

For several more seconds my hips make their final violent thrusts, fighting to maintain their motion even through the waves of pleasure that are causing my entire body to contort and shake. 

Finally, it’s over. I sit back, breathing deeply, exhausted, and satisfied. 

And that is how I fucked a table.

I’m a 21 year old guy living in New York City with Spinal Muscular Atrophy, a neuromuscular disease that affects all muscles. AMA


Some photos of yours truly - https://imgur.com/gallery/pweqMU3

Hey guys! I’m a 21 year old with SMA Type 2. Because of my disability, I use a power wheelchair, and have extremely limited muscle and mobility. I’m fortunate to have home care assistance, and live alone in an apartment in manhattan. 

I also work full time as a graphic designer, and just graduated in May with my BFA. In my free time, I’m always working on creative projects and trying to make cool shit. Oh and I also procrastinate by browsing Reddit, Twitter, Instagram, etc. My other interests include comedy, television, film, writing, news, sports, and basically anything else media and entertainment.

Happy to answer questions about anything including my daily life, college, accessibility, disability, medical, dating, living independently, technology, my interests, my job, family, friends, etc. 

I’m a firm believer that this kind of open discussion is not only some fun, but also the most productive way to promote disability awareness and to make lives better for people with disabilities.
